name: intolerance
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 [ U ] the fact of refusing to accept ideas, beliefs, or behaviour that are different from your own: racial/religious intolerance We do not have room for hatred, intolerance, and bigotry.
[ C or U ] If you have a food intolerance, you cannot digest a particular food in a normal way and may feel ill if you eat it: (a) food intolerance a wheat/lactose intolerance Amy has an intolerance to dairy products.
the feeling of being unable to bear something: One side-effect of the drug is intolerance of bright light.
